description: T1 Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp) - rear garden - outgrown location in raised bed close to property and wall - wall damaged by tree - - Reduce height approx. 1-1.5m past previous reduction points (total of up to 3m) to suitable new growth points leaving furnishing growth where possible - Reduce laterally approx. 0.5-1mm past previous reduction points (total of up to 2.5m) to suitable new growth points leaving furnishing growth where possible - Remove all waste through property - To slow root expansion and improve light to surrounding gardens and properties.T2 California Lilac x 1 (Ceanothus spp) - rear garden - Reduce back from neighbours by approx. 0.5m and trim remaining crown to shape retaining greenery
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
